#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int t,x,y,n,i,ans,cnt;
        cin>>n;
        i=1;
        cnt=0;
        if(n==1)
        {
          t=1;
        }
        while(i<n)
        {
            i=2*i;
            cnt++;
        }
        x=1;
        for(i=1;i<=cnt-1;i++)
        {
            x=x*2;
        }
        y=x*2;

        if(y==n)
            t=1;

        else if(n%2==0)
        {
            ans=1;
            for(i=x+2;i<=n;i+=2)
            {
                ans+=4;
            }
            t=ans;
        }

        else
        {
            if(n!=1){
            ans=-1;
            for(i=x+1;i<=n;i+=2)
            {
                ans+=4;
            }
            t=ans;
            }
        }
        cout<<t<<endl;
    return(0);
}
